body.p:
Subfeed circuit breakers can have these features:
Shunt trip on subfeed breakers (requires 120V)
Bell Alarm: dry contact annunciation on shunt trip
Auxiliary switch status indicator for circuit breaker
Padlock mechanism for each breaker
In WaveStar Infinity Monitoring, Auxiliary switch contacts and Bell Alarm contacts are digital inputs. Relay outputs are customized per installation. See .
For WaveStar Monitoring, see section and for more information on subfeed dry contacts.
